NK036(chi)022:0: bi ma snying thig spros bcas dkyil 'khor bri tshul rta babs sogs mkha' 'gro snying thig dang 'dra /
NK036(chi)022:1: rtsig pa dang rta babs snam bu'i kha dog sogs kyang khyad med /
NK036(chi)022:2: lha gnas la dbus su pad 'dab brgyad lte ba mthing ga ze'u 'bru ser po can /
NK036(chi)022:3: dbus su rnam snang yab yum mthing ga yab 'khor dril /
NK036(chi)022:4: pad 'dab shar du rdor sems yab yum gzhan gsum la'ang yab yum pad zla'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
NK036(chi)022:5: rigs 'gres yab thams cad g.yas rang rtags phyag mtshan
NK036(chi)022:6: thugs ka dang g.yon dril bu dkur brten thams cad
NK036(chi)022:8: yum rnams sku mdog yab ltar gri thod 'dzin pa'o //
NK036(chi)022:10: mtshams kyi 'dab bzhir shar lhor l+aa s+ye dkar mo me long /
NK036(chi)022:11: lho nub m+aa la mthing ga rin po che'i phreng ba /
NK036(chi)022:12: nub byang g+airti dmar po pi wam /
NK036(chi)022:13: byang shar nirti ljang gu gar gyi phyag rgya can pad nyi'i gdan la sems skyil gyis bzhugs pa /
NK036(chi)022:14: pad+ma bri tshul la phyogs bzhi na nga ma rnams
NK036(chi)022:15: shar dkar lho ser nub dmar byang ljang phyi rim
NK036(chi)022:16: mthing ga / mtshams bzhi'i nang ma dmar skya phyi ma ljang gu yin no //
NK036(chi)022:17: 'dod snam la mchod pa'i lha mo spyi ltar ro //
NK036(chi)022:19: phyi rol du rdo ra dang de phyir me ri lnga ldan gyis spud dgos /
NK036(chi)022:20: dur khrod dang pad phreng med /
NK036(chi)022:21: kun mkhyen chen po'i phyag bzhes bzhin gter chen bla
NK036(chi)022:22: ma mchog gi dkyil thang la zhib tu bltas nas
NK036(chi)022:23: ji lta ba bzhin bris pa yin /
NK036(chi)022:24: kun mkhyen chen po'i phyag len rgyun 'khrul med yin gsungs /
NK036(chi)022:25: 'gyur med skal bzang khu dpon gyi phyag bris las bshus so //
